title: Outerfields PCN Landing Page Redesign
description: Transform the Outerfields landing page into a Netflix-style gated content platform with $99 lifetime membership as the core conversion goal. Implement premium content network with tiered video access, authentication, Stripe integration, and analytics dashboard.
implementation_notes: UPDATE 2026-01-13: Netflix-style gated membership is the current PRD direction. Build-in-Public docs are out of date and should be treated as archived context. The Outerfields package now includes Stripe checkout/webhook, auth with D1+KV sessions, video APIs, and founding member $99 lifetime pricing; remaining work is primarily production deployment configuration.

stories.title: Authentication and User System
stories.description: Implement authentication system with email/password, session management, and user state tracking. Set up database schema for users, subscriptions, and content access.
stories.implementation_notes: Login page exists at /login with simple form. Navigation.svelte shows user state with role badge. /api/auth/logout endpoint exists. MISSING: server/auth.ts, D1 migrations, session persistence, protected routes, tests.

stories.title: Stripe $99 Membership Integration
stories.description: Integrate Stripe Checkout for $99 one-time payment. Create membership activation flow that grants access after successful payment. Store subscription status in database.
acceptance: Stripe Checkout session created for $99 payment
stories.implementation_notes: NO Stripe integration exists. No checkout endpoints, no webhook handlers, no payment processing. The actual site uses 3-tier monthly SaaS pricing ($49/$149/$399) but has NO payment system implemented. This is a core missing piece of the PRD's $99 lifetime membership model.

stories.title: Gated Access System Foundation
stories.description: Create gated access component that checks user membership status. Implement modal overlay for non-members with upgrade CTA. Define access tiers: fully_playable, preview_with_gate.
acceptance: Non-members see modal with 'Unlock Full Access' CTA
Members bypass gate and see full content
Component uses Canon tokens for styling
stories.implementation_notes: NO gated access system exists anywhere on the site. No GatedContent component, no membership checks, no access tier definitions, no upgrade modals. The entire site is publicly accessible without any content gating. This is fundamental to the PRD's Netflix-style membership model and completely absent.

stories.title: Video Content Database and Basic Player
stories.description: Set up database schema for video content with metadata (title, description, duration, thumbnail, access_tier). Create basic video player component with controls.
acceptance: Migration creates videos table with all fields
Sample seed data for 5+ videos loads successfully
VideoPlayer component renders video with controls
stories.implementation_notes: VideoModal.svelte exists with ADVANCED features (engagement heatmap, 'Most Replayed', PiP mode, watch/replay tracking, KV integration). However, NO D1 database for videos, NO migrations, NO seed data, NO access_tier field. Videos are hardcoded demo content served from R2 CDN. The component is more sophisticated than specified but lacks the foundational database architecture.

stories.title: Netflix-Style Content Category Component
stories.description: Create CategoryRow component with horizontal scrolling. Implement arrow navigation and video card grid. Style matches Netflix aesthetic with Canon tokens.
acceptance: CategoryRow displays videos in horizontal scroll
Video cards show thumbnail, title, duration
stories.implementation_notes: NO CategoryRow component exists. NO VideoCard component. The site uses FeaturedVideos.svelte with a grid layout instead of Netflix-style horizontal scroll. No arrow navigation, no hover play buttons. The content display pattern is fundamentally different from PRD specification.

stories.title: Hero Section with Galaxy Animation
stories.description: Create hero section with 'Building Outerfields: The Odyssey' title, galaxy/space animation background, and primary CTA. Implement scroll-triggered parallax effect.
acceptance: Hero section renders with galaxy animation
Title 'Building Outerfields: The Odyssey' displays with --text-display
Animation uses Canvas or CSS for stars/galaxy effect
stories.implementation_notes: HeroSection.svelte exists with DIFFERENT CONCEPT: Platform marketing hero with badge ('Alpha Release'), headline, description, demo CTA. NO galaxy/space animation. NO 'Building Outerfields: The Odyssey' title. NO parallax scroll effect. The hero is professional SaaS marketing style, not the cinematic space-themed vision from PRD.

stories.title: Analytics Dashboard Section with Gated Preview
stories.description: Create Analytics Dashboard section showing real-time metrics from ClickUp, Instagram, YouTube. Gate detailed metrics behind membership with preview visible to all.
acceptance: Preview shows 3-4 high-level metrics (tasks, followers, views)
Detailed metrics gated behind GatedContent component
Real-time data fetched from APIs (or mock data initially)
Chart visualizations use Canon color tokens
stories.implementation_notes: AIAnalytics.svelte exists and displays analytics section with metrics. MISSING: Gated access system, real API integration with ClickUp/Instagram/YouTube, 'Unlock Full Analytics' modal for non-members.

acceptance: Crew Call Series section renders on homepage
stories.implementation_notes: NO Crew Call Series content exists. No content category, no episodes, no database entries. The site has FeaturedVideos.svelte with 6 demo videos, but none are labeled as 'Crew Call Series'. This content category from the PRD doesn't exist in the implementation.

Visual diagram or card grid layout

stories.description: Create focused pricing section with single offer: $99 lifetime membership. Emphasize value, one-time payment, and full access benefits.

Benefits listed: unlimited access, all content, tools, future updates
Primary CTA button leads to Stripe checkout
stories.implementation_notes: Pricing.svelte + Testimonials.svelte exist but with DIFFERENT MODEL: 3-tier monthly SaaS ($49 Creator/$149 Pro/$399 Agency) instead of single $99 lifetime. acceptance: All section headlines compelling and clear

No /audit-voice violations found in spot check. Testimonials.svelte provides social proof. Site uses professional SaaS marketing copy style.

stories.title: Mobile Refinement and Responsive Design
stories.description: Ensure all components work perfectly on mobile devices. Test horizontal scrolling, video playback, modals, and forms on small screens.
acceptance: All CategoryRow components scroll smoothly on mobile
Video player controls accessible on touch screens
Font sizes use clamp() for responsive scaling
Touch targets meet accessibility guidelines (44px min)
stories.implementation_notes: Responsive design patterns exist throughout all components. Fluid typography with clamp(), responsive breakpoints at 640px/768px/1024px. VideoModal has touch-friendly controls. Navigation works on mobile. MISSING: Formal testing verification, CategoryRow horizontal scroll (no CategoryRow component exists), accessibility audit for 44px touch targets.
